import numpy as np
import math
import pandas as pd

flag=0
N=int(input("Enter the number of elements in X\n"))
Xs=np.random.rand(1,N)
X=Xs[0]
q=int(input('Enter the number of classes\n'))

sigmas=np.random.rand(1,q)
ms=np.random.rand(1,q)
sigma=sigmas[0]
m=ms[0]
np.random.seed(0)
alphas = np.arange(1,q+1)
alpha=np.random.dirichlet(alphas)
w=0

while True:
    pi_joint=[]
    for x in range (0,N):
        pi_joint.append([])
        for z in range (0,q):
            temp=((alpha[z]*math.exp((-(X[x]-m[z])**2)/(2*sigma[z])))/(math.sqrt(2*np.pi*sigma[z])))
            pi_joint[x].append(temp)
            
    alpha1=[]
    sigma1=[]
    m1=[]
    for z in range (0,q):
        alpha1.append(alpha[z])
        sigma1.append(sigma[z])
        m1.append(m[z])
        
    sum_joint=[]
    temp1=0
    for x in range(0,N):
        for z in range(0,q):
            temp1+=pi_joint[x][z]
        sum_joint.append(temp1)
        temp1=0
        
    temp2=0       
    pi_conditional=[]
    for x in range(0,N):
        pi_conditional.append([])
        for z in range(0,q):
            temp2=(pi_joint[x][z])/sum_joint[x]
            pi_conditional[x].append(temp2)
    
    sum_conditional=[]
    temp3=0
    for z in range(0,q):
        for x in range(0,N):
            temp3+=pi_conditional[x][z]
        sum_conditional.append(temp3)
        
    for z in range(0,q):
        alpha[z]=0
        m[z]=0
        sigma[z]=0
    
    for z in range(0,q):
        for x in range(0,N):
            alpha[z]+=pi_conditional[x][z]
        alpha[z]=alpha[z]/N
        
    for z in range(0,q):
        for x in range(0,N):        
            m[z]+=(pi_conditional[x][z]*X[x])
            sigma[z]+=(pi_conditional[x][z]*((X[x]-m[z])**2))
        m[z]=m[z]/sum_conditional[z]
        sigma[z]=(sigma[z]+q)/(sum_conditional[z]+q/2)
        
    error_alpha=[]
    error_sigma=[]
    error_m=[]
        
    for z in range(0,q):
        error_sigma.append(abs(sigma[z]-sigma1[z]))
        error_alpha.append(abs(alpha[z]-alpha1[z]))
        error_m.append(abs(m[z]-m1[z]))
    
    for z in range(0,q):
        if error_sigma[z]>=10**(-6):  
            flag=0
        elif error_alpha[z]>=10**(-6):
            flag=0
        elif error_m[z]>=10**(-6):
            flag=0
        else:
            flag=1
    w+=1
    if flag==1:
        break
